tool_description: We provide geographical information on states, places, districts, and zip codes. We also provide hospital and health data.
name: StatBasin
title: StatBasin

api_list.name: States and Territories
api_list.description: This endpoint returns information on all 50 states and some U.S. territories. Some of this information includes the state name, capital, abbreviation, etc. Query parameters for this endpoint can be used by themselves or can be combined with other parameters. Note that if a parameter accepts lists of values, you must use a comma to separate them. Unless specified otherwise string type values are not case sensitive.
